page.title: 02MAYNARDS GREEN SCHOOL
page.content: Maynards Green County Primary School has 223 children in its seven classes,eight teachers and a Headteacher.It has two computers,a roofed in swimming pool and is very well looked after by its caretaker,Mr Richards.The juniors have to use outside toilets which are very cold in winter. The school day begins at 9.00a.m. and finishes at 3.20 p.m. School meals are served at 12.15 p.m.and about half the school have a packed lunch.A school dinner costs 67p.The meals are organised on a cafeteria basis.There are many school clubs including gymnastics,football, netball,choir,recorders,stoolball,athl etics and swimming.The school at present holds both the cups for the best swimming relay teams in the area.
